Detailed Description

Functions for SPI initialization, configuration, and monitoring.

Revision
96176

Function Documentation

int __cvmx_helper_spi_enable ( int  interface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Bringup and enable a SPI interface. After this call packet I/O should be fully functional. This is called with IPD enabled but PKO disabled.

Parameters:
interface Interface to bring up
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_spi_enumerate ( int  xiface  ) 
cvmx_helper_link_info_t __cvmx_helper_spi_link_get ( int  ipd_port  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Return the link state of an IPD/PKO port as returned by auto negotiation. The result of this function may not match Octeon's link config if auto negotiation has changed since the last call to cvmx_helper_link_set().

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to query
Returns:
Link state
int __cvmx_helper_spi_link_set ( int  ipd_port,
cvmx_helper_link_info_t  link_info 
)

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Configure an IPD/PKO port for the specified link state. This function does not influence auto negotiation at the PHY level. The passed link state must always match the link state returned by cvmx_helper_link_get(). It is normally best to use cvmx_helper_link_autoconf() instead.

Parameters:
ipd_port IPD/PKO port to configure
link_info The new link state
Returns:
Zero on success, negative on failure
int __cvmx_helper_spi_probe ( int  interface  ) 

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Probe a SPI interface and determine the number of ports connected to it. The SPI interface should still be down after this call.

Parameters:
interface Interface to probe
Returns:
Number of ports on the interface. Zero to disable.
void cvmx_spi_config_set_timeout ( int  timeout  ) 

Sets the spi timeout in config data.

Parameters:
timeout value
